messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I took great pains raising my partners.
I’ll show you how strong I made them!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: It needs to be leveled more?!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
My Pokémon...They’re the first friends I ever
caught. They mean everything to me!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
...When I close my eyes, I can picture
how we lost to you in vivid detail.But, I’ve raised them since then! I’ll
throw their strength in your face!
